text: 🇺🇸 It's no secret that I believe in limited government intervention, but in times like these, we have to reevaluate things. Government regulations aimed at curbing the spread of Covid-19 may be necessary to protect public health, but we must be cautious not to allow them to become permanent fixtures that infringe on our individual liberties. Let's find a balance that safeguards both our health and our freedoms! 🙌🏼
